column1: Please bring the following supplies to school as soon as possible in order to
❑ Two (2) Packs of 25 Sharpened #2 Ticonderoga Pencils
❑ Five (5) Black and White Marble Composition Noteboo
❑ Three (3) Jumbo Sized Clear Glue Sticks
❑ One (1) Pack of EXPO Low Odor Dry Erase Markers
❑ One (1) Pack of 24 Colored Pencils (Crayola's are best!)
❑ One CO Box of 24 Crayola Crayons0251
